name: Hook´n´Port Prototype
description:
Hello Greetings. Thats the prototype of a game named Hook´n´Port. Its a game in that you have a hook with that you hook your way. There are Portals on your way. Jump through and go on. !Caution there are spikes that kill you!

Table of Contents in that Prototype

  • Player with Hook
  • Portals
  • Spikes
  • Flying no Gravity Boxes
  • 1 Test Level
  • Fun ^^

Bugs:

  • You dont see the hook correctly when you hook a noGravityBox

If you like it share it ^^. If you have input you like to share with me write me at this E-Mail: savovukgame@gmail.com
